mapper.update: update pf_corder_operation_log set create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, create_man = #{createMan,jdbcType=BIGINT}, pf_corder_id = #{pfCorderId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, pf_corder_status = #{pfCorderStatus,jdbcType=INTEGER}, remark = #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.select: select id, create_time, create_man, pf_corder_id, pf_corder_status, remark from pf_corder_operation_log
